misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation.
description: The code directly uses the algorithm specified in the algorithmName variable without considering the strength or security of the algorithm. This can lead to the selection of a less-secure algorithm during negotiation.
recommendation: Instead of directly using the algorithm specified in the variable, consider using a more secure algorithm like AES/GCM/NoPadding for AES encryption.
